actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of John and Margaret Diehl, Julie Eastridge, and Jerome and Betty Davis.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction on the appropriate district courts over specified wrongful death claims of five named individuals against the United States. Requires that suit upon such claims be brought during a specified period. Declares that, for purposes of this Act, such deaths shall not be deemed to have arisen out of, or in the course of, activity incident to military service.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of John and Margaret Diehl, Julie Eastridge, and Jerome and Betty Davis.
